mapper.select: SELECT * FROM products WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE status = 1 AND (name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) ORDER BY sales DESC, create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY sales DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT * FROM products WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT * FROM products WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM products WHERE status = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products (name, description, price, stock, sales, status, category_id, create_time) VALUES (#{name}, #{description}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{sales}, #{status}, #{categoryId}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE products SET name = #{name}, description = #{description}, price = #{price}, stock = #{stock}, status = #{status}, category_id = #{categoryId} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE products SET stock = stock - #{quantity} WHERE id = #{id} AND stock >= #{quantity}
UPDATE products SET sales = sales + #{quantity} WHERE id = #{id}
